str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
From a compound of apo and lutron; ransom in full, i.e. riddance, or Christian salvation.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A sending away, a letting go, a release, pardon, complete forgiveness. From aphiemi; freedom; pardon.
